text.jpText:
決戦の『有馬記念』。1度は走ることを
止めたアグネスタキオンが完全復活を
遂げ、出走する。
text.enText:
In the decisive Arima Kinen, Agnes Tachyon,
who had once stopped running, made a
complete comeback and ran in the race.

text.jpText:
再起の背を押したのはマンハッタンカフェが
見せた走りと、遠くに見た光――
すなわち『ウマ娘の限界の先』の世界。
text.enText:
It was Manhattan Cafe's performance and the
light I saw in the distance that pushed me
to revive my career, in other words, the
world of "Beyond the Limits of Uma Musume.

text.jpText:
その世界は私のものだと闘志を露わにする
アグネスタキオンに、マンハッタンカフェは
『お友だち』が被って見えた。
text.enText:
The world is mine," said Agnes Tachyon, who
revealed her fighting spirit, while
Manhattan Cafe looked like a friend.

text.jpText:
導き合い、走り合う――2人はそれぞれの
果てを求めてゲートへ向かうのだった。
text.enText:
They lead each other, they run together, and
they both head for the gate in search of
their own ends.
